meanings.sent1: After making a mistake, she decided to reroll the dice.
meanings.sent2: In the game, players can reroll their turns if they wish.
meanings.sent3: The baker accidentally dropped the dough, so he had to reroll it.
meanings.sent4: She felt like rerolling her life choices to see if things would turn out differently.
meanings.sent5: The student kept rerolling the pencil in his hand while thinking.

meanings.sent1: The rerolling of the carpet made the room look fresh and clean.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic performed a rerolling of the metal sheet to get the desired shape.
meanings.sent3: The rerolling of the dice caused excitement among the players.
meanings.sent4: The rerolling of the waves on the shore was calming to watch.
meanings.sent5: The rerolling of the film reel fixed the glitch in the movie screening.
